name: GRIND (itch) (inwan78)
description:
It is a simple game that only aims at the goal in the upper part of the screen .

However, there are moving walls in the way to the goal. There is no problem if you just touch it. But if you get sandwiched. . .
notice:This game can not be cleared easily.

There arel 20 stages. But you can play up to 10th stage on browser. Pleas download app version of this game if you want to play all stages.

-Controls
Direction button ... direction input, character operation (8 directions)
A button ... decision
B button ... Cancel
START button ... Start, pause
* Only the direction button is used during the game.

Music

 YouFulka https://wingless-seraph.net/
